list.name: AIR-SUPERIORITY
list.description: Supply Drop now includes a bomb that adds x% more damage to the drop and also allows it to destroy walls.
list.descriptionHtml: Supply Drop now includes a bomb that adds x% more damage to the drop and also allows it to destroy walls.

list.name: FIELD-PROMOTION
list.description: Friendly Brawlers have their maximum health increased by x every second that they are in range of this ability while it's active.
list.descriptionHtml: Friendly Brawlers have their maximum health increased by x every second that they are in range of this ability while it's active.
